item.title: Android Internals IPC: Binder and Service Manager Perspective
item.description: Introduction As mentioned in the previous article, Android uses the Binder for IPC communications. Good to know, the Binder was not created by Google.

item.title: Android Internals IPC: Introduction
item.description: Introduction In the last few months I was studying Android Internals in order to perform some security research in the future.
